app.VARNING: GLÖM INTE kommatecken I SLUTET. DÅ FAILAR DEN ALLTID = Den står i Laddar annonser och hjulet snurrar, mer händer inte
app.VARNING_OM_PUNKT_I_KEY: i18next har inte by default stöd för punkt i en key string. Man kan dock byta ut def punkt i init med keyseparator, nsseparator eller använda plugin i18next-text: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27015970/i18next-json-dot-in-key-or-label
app.REMMING: Man kan inte lägga in REM-rader i denna fil... som du kanske märker...
app.TRANSLATE: Använd reg expr i notepad + + och replace på < . * ?> mot <> innan skickas för översättning till vänner!!! YEAH!!
app.VARIABLES: Jag heter __namn__. Detta är en __variabel__ och den anropas med $ . t("app.VARIABLES", {namn: "Danny", variabel: "xyz"} )
app.title: Freetocollect.co.uk

add.1poetsayingsdefault: "An advert without photo is a flower without its petals."
add.1poetsayings: "An advert without photo is a flower without its petals.";"Alas, you abstruse ad, whether your photo hath gone?";"A picture says more than a thousand adverts ...";"Wow! What great pictures!!!.";"So grays is that ad without facsimile of reality.";"An ad photo should have good lighting.";"Imagine how beautiful a photo conveys.."

add.3thanksfor2:
Köpkod: __payid__

Din annons blir synlig efter betalning:

Ring 0939-1190400 ange köpkod: __payid__
Samtalet kostar 25:- SEK inklusiv moms.

Eller sms:a "bort __payid__" till 72550.
Pris 25:-SEK ink.moms + vanlig sms-kostnad.

Ring och ange köpkod "__payid__"SMSa "bort __payid__" till 72550
add.3thanksfor1: Your ad is now posted and visible.
add.msg_observe_choose_correct_type: Note: If your ad relates to wish for something, select "want" instead of "give" next to the heading. Thx Freetocollect.
add.msg_note_only_allowed_sell_animals: Note that ONLY animal listings must have symbolic prices. All other goods must be donated free of charge at Freetocollect.co.uk.
add.msg_type1_is_free_type2_costs: Giving is free, to wish for something is also free for now. Thx Freetocollect.co.uk
add.msg_all_ads_must_have_title: All ads must begin with a title!
add.msg_work_on_title: Work a little more with the title please...
add.msg_description_more_details: Please describe your goods with some details also...
add.msg_description_more_words: Try to fill out the description with a few more words.
add.msg_description_too_few_chars: I can tell you tried... but please add a few more relevant words in the description.
add.msg_description_too_many_chars: Wow! You are apparently very ambitious. Unfortunately, we have to ask you to shorten down the description just a tiny bit.
add.msg_choose_a_category: Also select the appropriate category before you post your ad.
add.msg_choose_a_category2: Please select the appropriate category for your advert.
add.msg_please_first_register4: Your profile does not seem to be complete. Please check your email and zip under 'My Page / My Details'.
add.msg_could_not_conn4: Could not create a connection. Try again!
add.msg_conn_photoupl_lost_retry: The connection for the photo upload was interrupted! Try again or mail our support if it does not resolve.
add.msg_conn_photoupl_canc_retry: The connection for the photo upload was interrupted. Try again!
add.msg_conn_photoupl_canc_severside: The connection was terminated from the server side! Try again or mail our support if it does not resolve.
add.msg_conn_canc_try_again: Connection was terminated. Please try again.
add.msg_please_first_register5: Please, first edit your details in 'My Page' and confirm your email!
add.msg_please_first_check_postal: Please, verify you stated a correct POSTAL CODE in 'My Page'.
add.msg_please_first_register6: Please fill out your contact information under 'My page' or contact our support if you still experience problem.

profile.title: My page
profile.yourprofile:
Your contact info
Apart from 'Email' this is the contact information that will be visible on your ads.
profile.name: Your name...
profile.Vanligen_fyll_i_Namn_Email_och_Postnumme: Please state your Name, Email and Postal code.
profile.msg_mob_lack_webstorage_supp: Your cellphone lack the Storage support. Please report this to our support.
profile.msg_please_enter_req_fields: Please state your Name, Email and Postal code.
profile.msg_please_verify_email: Please verify Email is a correct email address.
profile.msg_please_verify_postal: Please verify your ZIP code is correct.
profile.msg_you_will_get_email_please_confirm: You will now recieve a confirmation email. Open this email to confirm your email address.
profile.msg_could_not_conn6: We can't reach the server right now. Try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
profile.msg_ad_is_now_closed_thx: The ad is now closed! Thank you for your contribution.
profile.msg_could_non_connect4: Connection failed! Check your internet connection and try again.
profile.msg_ris_ros_please_more_words: Please formulate some more words for us to understand the meaning...
profile.msg_thx_ris_ros: Thanks for your contribution. If you have questions about cooperation or our service, have a look at our website for contact info or see Information tab to the left. Should you experience problems with the app, you can email our support.
profile.html_postal_incorrect: This seems to be an incorrect postal code. Please verify again. Should you still have problems, please contact our support.
profile.html_cld_not_verify_email_conn_error: Can not verify your email due to connection problems. Please verify you have internet access.
profile.html_email_sent_pls_conf: An email has been sent to you. Click on the link in this email to confirm that you are owner of this email address. Resend this email
profile.msg_email_resent: You should now recieve an email. Please verify you inbox and spam box.
profile.html_email_confirmed: Emailaddress confirmed.
profile.html_email_not_conf_please_save: The email has not been confirmed. Press Save button to proceed.
profile.risrosbody: Please keep us updated about what you would like us to change or do in another way. We'd love to know your thoughts. =)
profile.closeadbody: Are you sure you want to close this ad?
